Minutes

Minutes from the hackathon: F2F Hackathon 21-22-23 January @ Manchester
Other item we discuss during the meeting:

  • Test scripts need to go through a validation process
  • Policy Identification needed in relation:
    • taking down service
    • curation best practices
    • tagging best practices
    • annotation best practices
  • Annotation
    • how mutable should annotations be? Allow user to make changes to their own annotations. Avoid over engineering the functionality
    • delegation of privileges to other users to make changes to services(annotations) owned by the delegator
    • most important thing is to keep the annotations up to date, that is what most users care about
  • 20 Questions
    • questions on statistics in the system, how manyâ€¦
    • questions on metrics, status
    • question relations
    • questions on editing and maintaining (house keeping) entries in the catalogue
